title: refactor(http2-stream): flatten 4-level nested loops in http2_recombine_cookie_headers
body:
## Issue
Deep nesting (4 levels) in cookie header recombination with nested loops makes code hard to follow.

**File**: `src/http/SocketHTTP2-stream.c`  
**Lines**: 1136-1187  
**Function**: `http2_recombine_cookie_headers`  
**Pattern**: DEEP_NESTING_4  
**Severity**: CRITICAL

## Current Code Structure
The function has 4 levels of nesting:
- Outer loop iterating through headers
- Cookie search loop  
- Skip check loop
- Index comparison conditional

## Recommendation
Refactor to reduce nesting:
- Extract inner loop logic to separate helper function
- Use early `continue` statements to reduce nesting
- Consider using a bitmap or set for tracking indices to skip
- Reduce maximum nesting to 2 levels

## Benefits
- Improved readability
- Clearer loop logic
- Easier to understand cookie recombination algorithm
- Better testability of extracted logic
